name: Mahjong Path Solitaire Puzzle
description:
Mahjong Path Solitaire is a free card matching game! The goal of this pyramid solitaire game is to match open pairs of identical tiles and remove them from the board, exposing the tiles under them for play. Can you eliminate all the pieces from the board?

From the creators of the popular Mahjong Venice Mystery!

Winning a round of Mahjong Path Solitaire involves skill, strategy, and calculation, and some luck. So GOOD LUCK!

NEW to iOS! Mahjong Path Solitaire is a deluxe solitaire game of 2018. Relax with a few fun rounds of this classic mahjong solitaire journey. Do you have what it takes to beat every level?
